products.description: Alan Electronic Systems Private Limited is a well established company in the field of Industrial Electronics with excellent growth. Alan enjoys substantial Market Share for its specialized products such as Micro-Controller based embedded systems, Power Electronics & Electro-Medical Systems. After successfully catering to competitive industrial market, ALAN launched its Medical Division in the year 2004. The first product of this division was Surgical Diathermy of International Standard.
